title: Will any of the other executors be dealing with the estate
question: Will any of the other executors be dealing with the estate?
paragraph1: These executors will be given the legal right to:
applicant-rights1: collect the estate’s assets (property, money and possessions)
applicant-rights3: distribute what’s left to the people entitled to it (the ‘beneficiaries’)

otherExecutorsApplying.required: Answer ‘yes’ if any of the other executors are dealing with the estate
